Name: Fantasy Mosaics 23: Magic Forest
About the game: The penguin family are getting ready to visit a magic forest and discover what it is like! This time forest inhabitants are interactive and you can play with them! Enjoy this new experience of solving challenging puzzles and explore the magic forest full of friendly dwellers! - Colorful mosaic puzzles - Interactive forest creatures - Explore the magic forest - Puzzles based on logic
